title: UG programmes offered
text: SKSSCBS offers B.Com with specializations (Accounting & Finance, Banking & Finance, Financial Markets, Data Analytics) and BBA/BBM/Business Management programmes.

title: PG programmes offered
text: It offers M.Com (Accounting & Finance), M.Com (Banking & Finance), and Business Management.

title: Accreditation
text: The school is NAAC ‘A’-accredited and part of the Somaiya Vidyavihar University system.

title: Mode of admission
text: The admission process and form submission are completely online via admissions.somaiya.edu.

title: Hostel facility
text: The university campus hosts multiple hostels; students admitted in SKSSCBS can opt for hostel accommodation subject to availability.

title: Admissions contact
text: You can contact via admissions@somaiya.edu or WhatsApp/call on +91 7028233777.
